successes.title: Double Fine's MASSIVE CHALICE
successes.description: A tactical strategy game on an epic fantasy timeline from the creators of Psychonauts, Br√ºtal Legend, and Iron Brigade!

Pledges.description: Download MASSIVE CHALICE for Windows, Mac, and Linux, DRM-free and on Steam.  Plus you'll get a special backers-only badge on the official Double Fine forums and your name will be listed in the "Backers" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS in the game and on the official website!
EXCLUSIVE BACKER RELIC, and EXTRA DIGITAL COPY

Start your first heroic generation with an awesome in-game backer-exclusive relic, to be designed by you and the community in the MASSIVE CHALICE forums! You'll also receive a second digital copy of MASSIVE CHALICE, through Steam or as a DRM-free download! Your name will grace the "Relic Backers" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS. + All previous rewards.
EARLY ACCESS, HD BEHIND-THE-SCENES, ART, and SOUNDTRACK

Early access to the game via Steam, exclusive downloadable HD versions of the public 2PP Behind-The-Scenes videos, a hi-res digital art package, and a digital copy of the MASSIVE CHALICE original soundtrack! Your name will be permanently displayed in the "Super Backers" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS. + All previous rewards.

Receive a MASSIVE CHALICE special edition box containing the game on disc for Windows, Mac, and Linux, and covered by a backer-exclusive cover designed by Cory Schmitz! Your name will be featured in the "Special Edition Backers" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS! + All previous rewards.
ADD YOUR NAME and LEGACY to MASSIVE CHALICE

Immortalize yourself in the world of MASSIVE CHALICE!  Submit your name and House preferences (color, sigil, motto, and castle name) to be included as one of the Bloodlines in the game!
                      
Your lineage will be immortally recorded in the "Bloodline Backers" section of the MASSIVE CREDITS.
